titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an exclusion for all dividends and interest received by individuals.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1585-1586)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/22/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from an individual's gross income: (1) dividends received from domestic corporations; and (2) interest.
